summary: This is an FBI evidence log documenting the submission of a 3TB hard drive containing verified forensic images (E01 files) related to case 90A-NY-3151227, which is a death investigation of Jeffrey Epstein. The hard drive is designated as a master copy and was collected on August 21, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the subject (UNSUB) of the death investigation case to which the submitted digital evidence pertains.

events.title: Collection of digital evidence hard drive
events.description: A WD Black 3TB hard drive was collected, containing verified forensic images related to the Jeffrey Epstein death investigation.

events.title: Submission of CART derivative evidence
events.description: The FBI formally logged the submission of derivative evidence (hard drive with forensic images) under item NYCO23596 for the Epstein death investigation case.

keyFacts: The document is an FBI evidence log for case 90A-NY-3151227, a death investigation of Jeffrey Epstein.
It records the submission of a master copy hard drive containing 11 verified forensic image files (E01 format), numbered NYCO23578 through NYCO23592.
The evidence was collected on August 21, 2019, and the log was created on August 22, 2019.
The document explicitly states it contains no FBI recommendations or conclusions and is restricted from distribution outside the receiving agency.
